snippet: Brightcove, an online video distribution platform, has set the price range for its initial public offering at $10 to $12 a share.
abstract: Brightcove, an online video distribution platform, has set the price range for its initial public offering at $10 to $12 a share.
lead_paragraph: Brightcove, an online video distribution platform, has set the price range for its initial public offering at $10 to $12 a share, according to a filing on Monday.

headline.main: Brightcove Looks to Raise $55 Million in I.P.O.
